bug.author: leemgs
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Case study: Related PR - #555</denchmark-h>
The statement below is report of "TAOS/pr-nnstreamer-apptest" in case of PR 555. <denchmark-code>TAOS/pr-nnstreamer-apptest â€” Successfully apptest is passed. Commit number is '69fd92b15ac97a5156c4487d003476d889a9322c'. </denchmark-code>
"Details" link is okay. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>My Proposal as a next activity of nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#261:</denchmark-h>
Q1: Is cibot message okay? Please check it. Let's display more helpful message instead of "Successfully apptest is passed." Q2: Please append "pr-nnstreamer-apptes.log" file in ./report/ folder. Q3: Please append "apptest" at the wiki page. - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/TAOS-CI/wiki#ci-facilities>https://github.com/nnsuite/TAOS-CI/wiki#ci-facilities</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/556>#556</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ohsewon>@ohsewon</denchmark-link> Please check Q1, Q2, and Q3 above for apptest module of NNStreamer.
